name: @nui/openwhisk-newrelic
description: Library for gathering metrics for Apache OpenWhisk actions and sending them to NewRelic

scripts.test: nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text mocha test --recursive && npm run node-fetch-test
scripts.node-fetch-test: git clone https://github.com/node-fetch/node-fetch.git; cd node-fetch; npm t -- --file ../test/probe/node-fetch.setup.js.txt
